mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record (user_id, restaurant_id, status, comment, rating) VALUES (#{userId}, #{restaurantId}, #{status}, #{comment}, #{rating})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, restaurant_id, status, rating, comment FROM record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE record SET status = #{status}, comment = #{comment}, rating = #{rating}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{recordId}
